ing: 1 pinch ground cayenne pepper, or to taste
des: "Great for a party as an appetizer. Dip bread in oil, and then in the dukka spices...Enjoy! We find this appetizer on the tables of restaurants in New Zealand."
ins: Grind almonds into small pieces using a mortar and pestle. Add sesame seeds, red chile powder, turmeric, onion salt, celery salt, cumin seeds, coriander, and cayenne; mix well.
